---
title: "Research"
listing: 
  contents: research # this name must match the name of the folder you created in step #1; here, all Quarto docs in the `posts` directory will be included on your listing page
  type: grid # or default/grid/table; each type has its own set of yaml options to include
  sort: "date desc" # can also sort on more than one field
  categories: true # allows you to sort posts by assigned categories 
  fields:  [title, image, date, categories]
  grid-columns: 1
  image-height: 400px
---
